short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find Hacker News posts for the current page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that shows you if the current webpage has been discussed on Hacker News. If discussions exist, it displays links to them along with points and comments. If no discussions are found, it offers a direct link to submit the page to Hacker News.
